Package imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic

Class Pnt2d.PntInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pnt2d
    Enclosing interface:
    Pnt2d
    public static class Pnt2d.PntInt
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pnt2d
    Immutable 2D point implementation with int coordinates. This class implements the Pnt2d interface. A public constructor (PntInt(int, int)) is provided but the preferred way of instantiation is by one of the static factory methods, such as from(int, int), from(int[]), etc. The int coordinates can only be retrieved via the publicly accessible field variables x, y, while the methods getX() and getY() return double values for compatibility reasons.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d
